info.description:
I came across the space wrapping equation of
uv = uv/dot(uv,uv)
then I tried
uv = uv/length(uv)
but didn't understand what I was seeing
so because length(uv)^2 = dot(uv,vu) I could take that ^2 and animate it to see what was going on
